name: The Attraction Distraction
description:
This is a simple minimalist style game that I thought would be a good one for me to actually finish.

So, yes, this is my first public release game - please be gentle ;)

You use the different types of magnetic posts to guide your ball bearing around a small track to reach the end.  But you're going to need to be careful with your speed and be quick on the reflexes to avoid touching the ground!

PLEASE NOTE: Any and all payments for this project will be given straight to itch.io for the support of their great site!
